posts.post_content:
Please drop me an email if interested. "NO" pm's please. Price shown includes shipping.
Payment via PayPal preferred w/ no added fee. Thanks, Tony

[url]andreatny@q.com[/url]

Sgc 20 T206 Walter Johnson Portrait -Piedmont- SOLD
Several creases, thus the grade, but who cares. Please note one crease does cross his face. 

Sgc 60 T206 Nap Lajoie w/ bat-Polar Bear- SOLD
Top & right border have a light Polar Bear frame overprint. Nice card
